summary: This is an email chain from September 21, 2021, involving an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York. The email discusses a review of Amazon data and specifically asks whether data exists for Ghislaine Maxwell's Amazon account from 1995-2005, indicating an ongoing investigation or evidence collection effort.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her Amazon account data from 1995-2005 is being sought by the prosecution.

events.title: Email request for Maxwell's Amazon records
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email requesting confirmation on whether data exists for Ghislaine Maxwell's Amazon account from 1995-2005.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email from September 21, 2021, involving a federal prosecutor.
The prosecution is seeking Amazon account data for Ghislaine Maxwell from 1995-2005.
The email indicates an active evidence review related to the Maxwell investigation as of late 2021.
The correspondence shows the prosecution is examining digital/consumer records as part of their case.
